short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An IMDb extension for viewing more detail about IMDb profiles, no affiliation with IMDb.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension for imdb.com that adds UI and functionality to profile pages. Displaying extra information such as graphs and hours wasted.

No affiliation with IMDb.
